import React, { SetStateAction } from 'react'; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; interface SendMessageProps { postId: number; setModalState: React.Dispatch>; } export default function SendMessageModal({ postId, setModalState, }: SendMessageProps) { return (
{/* Background overlay, show/hide based on modal state. Entering: "ease-out duration-300" From: "opacity-0" To: "opacity-100" Leaving: "ease-in duration-200" From: "opacity-100" To: "opacity-0" */}
​ {/* Modal panel, show/hide based on modal state. Entering: "ease-out duration-300" From: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95" To: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100" Leaving: "ease-in duration-200" From: "opacity-100 translate-y-0 sm:scale-100" To: "opacity-0 translate-y-4 sm:translate-y-0 sm:scale-95" */}

You need an account in order to create your own request. If you already have an account Click here to login.

{}} validationSchema={Yup.object({ email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email address') .required('Required'), password: Yup.string() .min(5, 'Must be at least 5 characters long') .required('Required'), passwordConfirmed: Yup.string().oneOf( [Yup.ref('password'), null], 'Passwords must match' ), })} >
); }
